values:
its been like forever since i actually wrote in this. but thats cool. because im cool. and cool people just do that.

im really psyched about this upcomming event with amber. we're going to go see eighteen visions, along with other 'cool' bands. because like i said. im cool and ambers cool. so were just two cool people. so when we're together..thats like..total coolness.

yeah, i haven't really been to a show in like forever. because..well actually.. i dont know why. but i guess thats just swell.

Guess what..33 days until my birthday, bitches. so i guess im excited about that, except the fact that im not doing anything for my birthday because i dont really feel like it. + last birthday was gay.

My dads in jail again. for like the 3rd time within 2 months. because he's a low-life. but i guess thats just marvelous. i've gotten kinda used to the fact tht he totally and utterly sucks. but thats alright, because so do i. must run in the family. 

but i guess im done writing because like 45753 people are talking to me and its too much of a hassle.

<3*meeeee

Last night my mother was out with her boyfriend for the whole time. so me of course, invites a few people over. but, nikki invited two people over who was pissinge everyone off..literally..so we had to have my brother make one of them leave cuz he refused. what a douche. so after a while, me and this kid sat at the the little table in my living room with some wonderful O.J. and Popov. We were really the only ones drinking it cuz everyone else had beer. After awhile, they wouldnt let me drink anymore cuz they said ill be out of it. so them dumbasses emptied out 2 'full' bottles of Corona on me.
assholes.
then around quarter-after one, two kids had to go home. but, one of them stole their dad's truck and came back. Woo..then about an hour and a half later everyone had to start getting home. So i went outside and i guess Morgan and them thought i was gonna like..run away or something. So it took me a while to get out there and give 'em all hugs goodbye. Somebody picked me up and carried me back in the house but im not quite sure which kid did it.. :S .. when they all left, my brother made me lay down and go to sleep.

and that was my night.

Last night me and nikki ordered pizza and this one awesome guy delivered it and he dropped our sauce and he was like.."and your sauce is on the ground cuz im a jack-ass" geez..whatta potty mouth. but approximately 15 minutes before the pizza arrived..we was ballin to our jamz on in the car. with nicoles "pimp" music. it was hysterical.


Then, we went inside and she busted out her Ricky Martin Shit..i mean whos cooler then ricky martin?


then the pizza came.

But today..me and this one girl aint friends no more but it dont bother me much because she lies to everyones parents including her own to try and make herself look better no matter how bad she makes her friends look. so she was like "yeah so you wanna hang out soon because i literally have no friends and i miss you so yeah tell me :)) Basically telling me that im a fucking back-up friend. she also said how she wanted it to be like the old days and shit...like our "pole" cuz we used to be together like ALL the time 2 summers ago..FYI..it'll never be like that...your ass replaced me a LONG time ago..and so..i've replaced you...


But Off The Topic Of Her..


me and nikki have had the most boring days this weekend.
except for the night when my mom left and didnt come home until 4:30 a.m. we had britt taelor jenniffer and erin over and we were all sitting in a little circle with a bottle of soda. nikki decides shes gonna take the bottle outa my hands. so i throw the pop on her and she grabs another bottle of soda and decides were gonna have a soda-fight..in the middle of my kitchen. so i guess that was fun few the few minutes it lasted..until we had to clean it all up...ugh...


But yeah...theres me weekend fer yah...
If you ain't got nothing nice to say..don't say anything at all..

hmm..yesterday i was a dumbass and had nicole paige cut my hair. she was only supposed to cut an INCH off....but....you know...she was kinda...5 inches off....no biggie though....(ugh)

xoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxo

however, while she was cutting away....she happened to find a piece very unattractive. so she decided to butcher it. so i have to get a totally new haircut..because it looks hideous.

xoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxo

Then, approximately 5 minutes later, i went to go smack her fer f*in up my hair. bad move. while i went to hit her, she flinched..putting the scissors in the path of my raging hand. causing my  palm to rest upon the scissor blade, slicing into my flesh. it began to bleed..continuously..

xoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxo

"Then", while we were on our journey to emma's house to have her mother attempt to save my hair, i happened to waltz into 3 humongous puddles of water. in a row. However, it was dark out so i couldnt see nothing..so my bottlecap decides to detatch from my grip, falling to the ground where i could not find it again.

xoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxo

basically, i had a horrible day yesterday.

Hmm..Today we skipped school..we left nicole's to go to my house and we ran past my mother whom was smoking a cigarette infront of our door. then we climbed into my window..making the most noise ever..but we didnt get caught...yet...


then..later on around a quarter to eleven..nikki decides to make a smartass move and sleep in my moms room. Since today is election day..my mom had the day off...*idiot*...


so she waltzes up in her room and finds her laying there..in a dead sleep...so she asks nikki if we skipped and her dumbass just shakes her head yes..saying nothing else. So..in order for her to not tell nikkis mom..(cuz shed go crazy thats why we went to my house)..we have to have a *spotless* house when she gets back. and of course if you no me..i didnt clean Shit, just nikki cleaned my house..haha...loser..

 

Yeah so basically..Nikki is a big ass loser who sucks big-time..shes sucha "douche"


oh yeah..gotta mention my fuckin sweet ass outfit i got goin on..i got green tights with my old "last in line"(whom is not a band anymore) whitie tighties on with the bands faces on it..and a green t-shirt..cuz im a pimp like that..

Ha..Today was just grand. me and thomas and jill left school after C lunch and went to the park. there we found a pop machine that was tipped over. thomas was going to buy a pop until we saw it was broken. so me and jill kicked it a few times..broke it open and stole a buncha pop...cuz were sweet like that.


During the whole park thing, thomas told us some kick-ass jokes..it made me giggle.


Then i was walking down grafton road to go back to the high school. There, Billy saw me walking and picked me up and gave me a ride.


and now, currently, my cat, BooBoo Kitty Fuck, is attacking my foot. i dont know why..but its just sweet like that.


But yeah..thats basically my day..bad-ass eh?

Today Me and Sarah and Amanda went out for Halloween...We trick-or-treated for like...a half hour at the most..Then we drove around ;)..Then i Got Chased By Mike Myers..(NOT Cool) Especially in My Condition..I Was Flipping Out..But Yeah..We Got Like NO Candy..Me and Sarah Were Getting VERY Annoyed With How Things Were Going And..It Coulda Been Better But..It Was Okay..


But Yeah Besides That..I Guess The Day Was Alright. I got an eye patch thing for my eye because its being gay and just decides to hurt for no reason..so i guess i was like...half a pirate..


Yesterday was pretty Crazy..Nicole decided to run off with a bottle of alcohol so i had to chase her around my backyard..then pry it outa her hands when she ran back in the kitchen.


Friday er Thursday..can't Remember..me and nicole had a Blue hair color/water/dish soap/chocolate syrup fight. so yeah that was fun i guess...except the whole sticky thing..


So I had a few interesting days lately i guess...but..im really tired right now so im going to go...

 

night <3
